bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: Labels created in Annotation UI with 0 assignments are lost on exiting the UI
bug.description:
We should support this use case for people who add all their labels before they start annotating. For example, I added the following labels while annotating: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/53988498-73b70a80-40d8-11e9-9851-03434bc12429.png></denchmark-link>
I closed it and annotated again on the SFrame that I got as output from tc.image_classifier.annotate and saw the following: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/53988543-90ebd900-40d8-11e9-8e55-6a5cb263acd9.png></denchmark-link>
